forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain this morning...thunderstorms likely by evening. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain this morning...thunderstorms likely by evening. High near 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers early, then overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers this evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
